about_the_game:
Pizza delivery guys wanted!

Buckle your seat belt and put your car in gear, when you become a delivery driver for Bing's Pizza, the possibilities are endless! Flexible driving schedules, hourly wage paid fully in pizza, awesome delivery vehicle, pizza eating benefits, and great tips! It doesn't stop there, at Bing's Pizza; citizens are always our top priority.

Our secret ingredient is YOU. Delivering with Bing's Pizza is a great part time or second job and it's also a great opportunity to start your career here. Many delivery drivers have gone on to be the first on the high score list . You will improve on the skills you have, and we'll teach you some new ones too. We are more than just a pizza delivery game; we're an awesome pizza delivery game.

Crash World offers:
  • Pizza delivery jobs
  • Side job possibilities
  • Pimp your ride with hats
  • High score list
  • City traffic
  • Funny dialogs

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Atos criminosos
Linguagem imprópria

reviews:
“Crashworld is the FUNNIEST GAME I've play in a long long time. The right mix of Grand Theft Auto, hilarious physics, and insane glitches left me laughing the whole way through! Play this game for yourselves and see what the fuss is all about!”
Markiplier

“I have pizzas to deliver and I can't waste my time avoiding people so I'll just crash right through!”
Jacksepticeye
short_description: Buckle your seat belt and put your car in gear, when you become a delivery driver for Bing's Pizza, the possibilities are endless!
